mapper.select: SELECT code , name , format(amount, 0) as amount , format(buyprice, 2) as buyprice , format(evalValue, 0) as evalValue , format(ratio, 4) as ratio , format(currentValue, 0) as currentValue FROM web_data.${account}_account_status order by code asc

select DATE_FORMAT(his_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as his_time , account_name , code_name , stock_code , format(buy_num, 0) as buy_num , format(sell_num, 0) as sell_num , format(amount, 0) as amount , format(ratio, 4) as ratio , format(profit, 0) as profit from ${account}_history where account_name = #{account} and stock_code = #{stock_code} order by his_time desc

select DATE_FORMAT(his_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as his_time , account_name , code_name , stock_code , format(buy_num, 0) as buy_num , format(sell_num, 0) as sell_num , format(amount, 0) as amount , format(ratio, 4) as ratio , format(profit, 0) as profit from ${account}_history where account_name = #{account} and stock_code = #{stock_code} and his_time between #{start_date} and #{end_date} order by his_time desc

select DATE_FORMAT(his_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as his_time , account_name , code_name , stock_code , format(buy_num, 0) as buy_num , format(sell_num, 0) as sell_num , format(amount, 0) as amount , format(ratio, 4) as ratio , format(profit, 0) as profit from ${account}_history where account_name = #{account} order by his_time desc

select DATE_FORMAT(his_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as date , format(sum(ratio), 4) as ratio , format(sum(profit), 0) as profit from ${account}_history where DATE_FORMAT(his_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d') group by date order by code_name asc;
